mapper.sql: rid, pid, reid, uid, type, date, state
mapper.insert: insert into report (rid, pid, reid, uid, type, date, state, reason) values (#{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update report
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reid = #{reid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where rid = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
